Retina ganglion cell.Comment: Spontaneous bursting generally during development during specified periods. Some RGCs are intrinsically photosensitive (ipRGCs) through expression of melanopsin.
Retina ganglion cell.Definition: The main principal neuron of the retina, whose axon projects to several sites in the brain: lateral geniculate nucleus on the pathway to visual cortex, superior colliculus and suprachiasmatic nucleus.  It receives input from bipolar cells, and has synaptic inputs
